_comment_AUTO_UPGRADE: Every time the ESP32 resets, it upgrades his firmware with the Github code.
_comment_ONLY_RELEASES: If it's true, it will only update the release code versions athoug it will update to last commit
_comment_COMMIT_BRANCH: When ONLY_RELEASES == false, will update to the last commit of this branch
_comment_MAXIMUM_VERSION: The maximum firmware that module can support (Value 'None' for no limit)
